annotations.description: The fans could demand a bit more entertainment for their money. This game was average. There wasn't any significant dominance by either side in this game. Both sides tried to combine well and to keep the ball at their feet.

annotations.label: corner

A lofted cross from Sebastian Kehl (Dortmund) is unsuccessful as the opponent's defence quickly clears the ball out of the penalty area. Good work from Dortmund as they win a corner.
Ciro Immobile (Dortmund) collects a great pass inside the box and misses a golden opportunity. His low shot was directed into the middle of the goal, but the goalkeeper does well to stop his effort.
Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) reacts well to get to the rebound and takes a shot from the edge of the box, but he fails to get the ball through the players standing between him and the goal.

It's unbelievable, Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) blows a huge opportunity! He has a lot of space around him and fires a terrific daisy cutter from point blank range. His first time effort is directed towards the middle of the target, but Oliver Baumann reacts superbly to keep the ball out.
Pirmin Schwegler (Hoffenheim) has picked up a minor injury, but it looks like he will be able to continue.
